title: unable to update
body:
I always get this error around ~80%, I'm almost certain it's not my connection send help :/
http://i.imgur.com/Dq1ZQdJ.png

replies.body: I hate to say it, but this issue is more than likely an unstable connection issue.  At this phase in the process, the patcher is trying to download updates from the patching servers but is backtracking then failing completely.  You'll want to run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
